Desc.eng: I was just trying to be sarcastic, milady. I do command a strong force here.
I’m glad to hear that, sergeant. Send some of these men to the positions in immediate danger!
You have sufficient forces, that’s true… but you lack firepower. Deploy some automated turrets!
That might be true, sergeant, but they still need a good, inspiring speech!
I’ll survey the positions first, then I’ll brief you later.
What an absolutely dreadful morning, sir. It looks to be a fitting day to die!
